tbh mobile base seems like the best option. I remember in Last Oasis it was the go to thing to do since static bases just scream "RAID ME". And you can also despawn it 😅
and that as well
well we could jut build a huge ass ship and use it as mobile base ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
thats what i was thinking
that i dont know. i havent used a printer yet tbh. would be cool if they also work for ships tho.

i feel like unless we know exactly how the economy will work theres to much speculation.
Like are we gonna see trading/hauling between station due to supply/demand ?
Is the AH global or station thied? etc. etc.
As of now we know nothing and i feel like economy is the most important factor for everything..
yea thas what u get when u have zerg. Individuals dont matter anymore. only mass which is really bad in terms of FUN etc. rather have a small company imho
might as well give yourself a number
instead of a nickname
no worries . when i talk zerg i mean several hundred members 😅 .
it was really bad in Last oasis ngl. medium group with around 50 members max or smth was the best experience to have there. dont know about SB yet

its like your a number. noone cares about your opinion. noone cares about what you do honestly (cuz they cant.. to many members). 
You just move with the masses thats about it. Thats how it was for me in that game.
yea. exactly. I dont mean to be rude to any faction in SB atm i just talking about my experience with it in Last Oasis.
yea that sounds good. I think what i mentioned is just a inevitable consequence of having alot of members tho it sounds good that you guys are aware of it
is it worth to run all the cables trough beams and rebolt 😓  or better wait for the new solid cables which are coming soon?
aight 👌

yea i agree. it will probably be followed by an FB announcement to stop spying thats probably gonna be it.
